name: Jungle Bird
description: Fresh pineapple juice is essential to the deliciousness of this recipe. Use a juice extractor or hand juicer, or muddle and strain some ripe chunks of fresh pineapple.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lime, simple syrup, Campari, pineapple juice, and rum to a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and shake until cocktail is quite cold, about 30 seconds. Serve in a Moscow Mule mug or old fashioned glass over a large ice cube.
